title: Relate Hilbert space to normed complex vector spaces

blocks.name: hilablo
blocks.content: Hilbert space vector addition is an Abelian group operation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hilablo() {
  |- wcel(cva, cablo)
} = {
  isabloi(hs0, hs1, cva, chba)
  isgrpoi(hs0, hs1, hs2, cva, chba, c0v, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))
  ax-hilex()
  ax-hvass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  ax-hv0cl()
  hvaddid2(cv(hs0))
  eqtrd(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), cva, cv(hs0)), c0v, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  mpancom(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), cva, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), chba))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), chba), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  hvmulcl(cneg(nat1), cv(hs0))
  ax-hvcom(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  hvnegid(cv(hs0))
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  ax-hvcom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0v)
  diff.hs1.c(c0v)
  diff.hs1.c(co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs2.c(cva)
  diff.hs2.c(chba)
  diff.hs2.c(c0v)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hilablo() {
  ‚ä¢ +h ‚àà AbelOp
} = {
  isabloi(hs0, hs1, cva, chba)
  isgrpoi(hs0, hs1, hs2, cva, chba, c0v, (-u(1)[.h]hs0))
  ax-hilex()
  ax-hvass(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  ax-hv0cl()
  hvaddid2(hs0)
  eqtrd(((-u(1)[.h]hs0)[+h]hs0), c0v, (hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs0)), hs0 ‚àà ~H)
  mpancom(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ((-u(1)[.h]hs0)[+h]hs0)=(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs0)), (-u(1)[.h]hs0)‚àà ~H)
  mpan(hs0 ‚àà ~H, (-u(1)[.h]hs0)‚àà ~H, -u(1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  neg1cn()
  hvmulcl(-u(1), hs0)
  ax-hvcom((-u(1)[.h]hs0), hs0)
  hvnegid(hs0)
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  ax-hvcom(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0v)
  diff.hs1.c(c0v)
  diff.hs1.c((-u(1)[.h]hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cva)
  diff.hs2.c(chba)
  diff.hs2.c(c0v)
}

blocks.name: hilid
blocks.content: The group identity element of Hilbert space vector addition is the zero vector. (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hilid() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cgi, cva), c0v)
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(cgi, cva), c0v, crio(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cgi, cva), crio(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cva, cgr))
  grpoidval(hs0, hs1, cva, cfv(cgi, cva), chba)
  eqid(cfv(cgi, cva))
  mpbi(wceq(crio(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))), c0v), wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))
  rgen(hs1, chba, wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  hvaddid2(cv(hs1))
  mp2an(wb(wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))), wceq(crio(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))), c0v)), wcel(c0v, chba), wreu(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))))
  ax-hv0cl()
  ax-mp(wreu(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cva, cgr))
  grpoideu(hs0, hs1, cva, chba)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(wcel(cva, cgr), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  riota2(hs0, c0v, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))), wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))
  ralbidv(hs1, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0v, cva, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cgi, cva))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cgi, cva))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(c0v)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(c0v, cva, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hilid() {
  ‚ä¢ (GId ` +h)= 0h
} = {
  eqtri((GId ` +h), c0v, iota(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1)))
  ax-mp((GId ` +h)= iota(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1)), +h ‚àà GrpOp)
  grpoidval(hs0, hs1, cva, (GId ` +h), chba)
  eqid((GId ` +h))
  mpbi(iota(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1))= 0h, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(0h[+h]hs1)= hs1))
  rgen(hs1, chba, (0h[+h]hs1)= hs1)
  hvaddid2(hs1)
  mp2an((‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(0h[+h]hs1)= hs1)‚Üî iota(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1))= 0h), 0h ‚àà ~H, ‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1)))
  ax-hv0cl()
  ax-mp(‚àÉ!(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1)), +h ‚àà GrpOp)
  grpoideu(hs0, hs1, cva, chba)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(+h ‚àà GrpOp, +h ‚àà AbelOp)
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  riota2(hs0, c0v, chba, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(0h[+h]hs1)= hs1))
  ralbidv(hs1, chba, hs0 = 0h, (hs0[+h]hs1)= hs1, (0h[+h]hs1)= hs1)
  eqeq1d((hs0[+h]hs1), hs1, (0h[+h]hs1), hs0 = 0h)
  oveq1(hs0, c0v, cva, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c((GId ` +h))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c((GId ` +h))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(c0v)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(0h[+h]hs1)= hs1))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = 0h)
}

blocks.name: hilvc
blocks.content: Hilbert space is a complex vector space. Vector addition is ` +h ` , and scalar product is ` .h ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hilvc() {
  |- wcel(cop(cva, csm), cvc)
} = {
  isvciOLD(hs0, hs1, hs2, cop(cva, csm), cva, chba, csm)
  hilablo()
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  ax-hfvmul()
  ax-hvmulid(cv(hs0))
  ax-hvdistr1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  ax-hvdistr2(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  ax-hvmulass(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  eqid(cop(cva, csm))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs2.c(cva)
  diff.hs2.c(chba)
  diff.hs2.c(csm)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hilvc() {
  ‚ä¢ < +h, .h > ‚àà CVecOLD
} = {
  isvciOLD(hs0, hs1, hs2, < +h, .h >, cva, chba, csm)
  hilablo()
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  ax-hfvmul()
  ax-hvmulid(hs0)
  ax-hvdistr1(hs1, hs0, hs2)
  ax-hvdistr2(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  ax-hvmulass(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  eqid(< +h, .h >)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs2.c(cva)
  diff.hs2.c(chba)
  diff.hs2.c(csm)
}

blocks.name: hilnormi
blocks.content: Hilbert space norm in terms of vector space norm. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hilnormi(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cno, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, cnv)
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cno, cfv(cnmcv, c0), cmpt(hs0, chba, cfv(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs0, chba, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)))))
  mpteq2ia(hs0, chba, cfv(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0))))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  ipnm(c0, cv(hs0), chba, cfv(cnmcv, c0), csp)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cmpt(hs0, chba, cfv(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  feqmptd(hs0, cfv(cnmcv, c0), chba, cr, wcel(c0, cnv))
  nvf(c0, cfv(cnmcv, c0), chba)
  eqid(cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  dfhnorm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hilnormi(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ normh =(normCV ` c0)
  ‚ä£ ~H =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ .ih =(.iOLD ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà NrmCVec
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cno, (normCV ` c0), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚Ü¶((normCV ` c0)` hs0)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚Ü¶(sqrt `(hs0[.ih]hs0))))
  mpteq2ia(hs0, chba, ((normCV ` c0)` hs0), (sqrt `(hs0[.ih]hs0)))
  mpan(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ((normCV ` c0)` hs0)=(sqrt `(hs0[.ih]hs0)), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  ipnm(c0, hs0, chba, (normCV ` c0), csp)
  ax-mp((normCV ` c0)=(hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚Ü¶((normCV ` c0)` hs0)), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  feqmptd(hs0, (normCV ` c0), chba, cr, c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  nvf(c0, (normCV ` c0), chba)
  eqid((normCV ` c0))
  dfhnorm2(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((normCV ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
}

blocks.name: hilhhi
blocks.content: Deduce the structure of Hilbert space from its components. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hhnv
blocks.content: Hilbert space is a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hhnv(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cnv)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  isnvi(hs0, hs1, c0, chba, cva, c0v, csm, cno)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(wcel(cva, cgr), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  eqcomi(c0v, cfv(cgi, cva))
  hilid()
  hilvc()
  normf()
  biimpa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  norm-i(cv(hs0))
  norm-iii(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  norm-ii(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hhnv(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà NrmCVec
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  isnvi(hs0, hs1, c0, chba, cva, c0v, csm, cno)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(+h ‚àà GrpOp, +h ‚àà AbelOp)
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  eqcomi(c0v, (GId ` +h))
  hilid()
  hilvc()
  normf()
  biimpa(hs0 ‚àà ~H, (normh ` hs0)= 0, hs0 = 0h)
  norm-i(hs0)
  norm-iii(hs1, hs0)
  norm-ii(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
}

blocks.name: hhva
blocks.content: The group (addition) operation of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hhba
blocks.content: The base set of Hilbert space. This theorem provides an independent proof of ~ df-hba (see comments in that definition). (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hhba(class c0) {
  |- wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c0), crn(cva))
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(wcel(cva, cgr), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  bafval(cfv(cba, c0), cva, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cba, c0))
  hhva(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hhba(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ ~H =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c0), ran(+h))
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(+h ‚àà GrpOp, +h ‚àà AbelOp)
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  bafval((BaseSet ` c0), cva, c0)
  eqid((BaseSet ` c0))
  hhva(c0)
}

blocks.name: hh0v
blocks.content: The zero vector of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hh0v(class c0) {
  |- wceq(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  3eqtr2ri(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c0), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), cfv(cgi, cva))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cn0v, c0), cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  hhnv(c0)
  0vfval(c0, cnv, cfv(cn0v, c0), cfv(cpv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cn0v, c0))
  fveq2i(cgi, cva, cfv(cpv, c0))
  hhva(c0)
  hilid()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hh0v(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ 0h =(0vec ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  3eqtr2ri(c0v, (0vec ` c0), (GId `(+v ` c0)), (GId ` +h))
  ax-mp((0vec ` c0)=(GId `(+v ` c0)), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  hhnv(c0)
  0vfval(c0, cnv, (0vec ` c0), (+v ` c0))
  eqid((+v ` c0))
  eqid((0vec ` c0))
  fveq2i(cgi, cva, (+v ` c0))
  hhva(c0)
  hilid()
}

blocks.name: hhip
blocks.content: The inner product operation of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hhip(class c0) {
  |- wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  mpbir(wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c0)), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1))))
  eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1)), co(co(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(ci, csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, co(ci, csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)))), cdiv, nat4), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  polid(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1)), co(co(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(ci, csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, co(ci, csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)))), cdiv, nat4)), wcel(c0, cnv))
  ipval3(c0, cv(hs0), chba, cv(hs1), cfv(cdip, c0), cno, cva, cmv, csm)
  hhva(c0)
  hhsm(c0)
  hhnm(c0)
  hhvs(c0)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c0)), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wf(csp, cxp(chba, chba), cc), wf(cfv(cdip, c0), cxp(chba, chba), cc))
  ax-hfi()
  ax-mp(wf(cfv(cdip, c0), cxp(chba, chba), cc), wcel(c0, cnv))
  hhnv(c0)
  ipf(c0, cfv(cdip, c0), chba)
  hhba(c0)
  eqid(cfv(cdip, c0))
  syl2an(wf(csp, cxp(chba, chba), cc), wf(cfv(cdip, c0), cxp(chba, chba), cc), wb(wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c0)), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cdip, c0), cv(hs1)))))), wfn(csp, cxp(chba, chba)), wfn(cfv(cdip, c0), cxp(chba, chba)))
  ffn(csp, cxp(chba, chba), cc)
  ffn(cfv(cdip, c0), cxp(chba, chba), cc)
  eqfnov2(hs0, hs1, csp, chba, chba, cfv(cdip, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(csp)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cdip, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(csp)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cdip, c0))
}

thm hhip(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ .ih =(.iOLD ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  mpbir(.ih =(.iOLD ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[.ih]hs1)=(hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, (hs0[.ih]hs1)=(hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1))
  eqtr4d((hs0[.ih]hs1), (hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1), (((((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[-]((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2))[+](i[√ó](((normh `(hs0[+h](i[.h]hs1)))[^]2)[-]((normh `(hs0[-h](i[.h]hs1)))[^]2))))[√∑]4), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  polid(hs0, hs1)
  mp3an1(hs0 ‚àà ~H, hs1 ‚àà ~H, (hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1)=(((((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[-]((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2))[+](i[√ó](((normh `(hs0[+h](i[.h]hs1)))[^]2)[-]((normh `(hs0[-h](i[.h]hs1)))[^]2))))[√∑]4), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  ipval3(c0, hs0, chba, hs1, (.iOLD ` c0), cno, cva, cmv, csm)
  hhva(c0)
  hhsm(c0)
  hhnm(c0)
  hhvs(c0)
  mp2an((.ih =(.iOLD ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[.ih]hs1)=(hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1)))), (.ih :(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), ((.iOLD ` c0):(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  ax-hfi()
  ax-mp(((.iOLD ` c0):(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), c0 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  hhnv(c0)
  ipf(c0, (.iOLD ` c0), chba)
  hhba(c0)
  eqid((.iOLD ` c0))
  syl2an((.ih :(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), ((.iOLD ` c0):(~H √ó ~H)‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (.ih =(.iOLD ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(hs0[.ih]hs1)=(hs0[(.iOLD ` c0)]hs1)))), .ih[Fn](~H √ó ~H), (.iOLD ` c0)[Fn](~H √ó ~H))
  ffn(csp, (~H √ó ~H), cc)
  ffn((.iOLD ` c0), (~H √ó ~H), cc)
  eqfnov2(hs0, hs1, csp, chba, chba, (.iOLD ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(csp)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.c((.iOLD ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(csp)
  diff.hs1.c((.iOLD ` c0))
}

blocks.name: hhph
blocks.content: The Hilbert space of the Hilbert Space Explorer is an inner product space. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hhph(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, ccphlo)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cnv), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  hhnv(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqid(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, wceq(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  normpar(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eqtr3d(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  oveq2d(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  fveq2d(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  hvsubval(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  addcomd(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  sqcld(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  recnd(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)), wcel(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), chba))
  hvaddcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  normcl(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)))
  sqcld(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba)), wcel(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1)), chba))
  hvsubcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  recnd(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1)), chba))
  normcl(co(cv(hs0), cmv, cv(hs1)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))), wcel(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), cc), wcel(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2), cc))
  sqcld(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  recnd(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), chba))
  normcl(cv(hs0))
  sqcld(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))
  recnd(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))
  normcl(cv(hs1))
  mp3an1(wcel(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), cc), wcel(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2), cc), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))), wcel(nat2, cc))
  2cn()
  adddi(nat2, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))
  mp3an(wb(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cnv), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), wcel(cva, universe), wcel(csm, universe), wcel(cno, universe))
  elexi(cva, cablo)
  hvmulex()
  mp2an(wcel(cno, universe), wf(cno, chba, cr), wcel(chba, universe))
  normf()
  ax-hilex()
  fex(cno, chba, cr, universe)
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(cva, universe), wcel(csm, universe), wcel(cno, universe)), wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cnv), wral(hs0, chba, wral(hs1, chba, wceq(co(co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cno, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))))))), wcel(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), ccphlo))
  eleq1i(c0, ccphlo, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  isphg(hs0, hs1, cva, universe, csm, universe, cno, universe, chba)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(wcel(cva, cgr), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
}

thm hhph(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà CPreHilOLD
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ‚àà CPreHilOLD, < < +h, .h >, normh > ‚àà NrmCVec, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))))))
  hhnv(< < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqid(< < +h, .h >, normh >)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, chba, (((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))))
  3eqtr4d((((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2)), (2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))), (((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)), ((2[√ó]((normh ` hs0)[^]2))[+](2[√ó]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  normpar(hs0, hs1)
  eqtr3d((((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2)), (((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)), (((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  oveq2d(((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2), caddc, ((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2), ((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  oveq1d((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1)), cexp, nat2, (normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  fveq2d(cno, (hs0[-h]hs1), (hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  hvsubval(hs0, hs1)
  addcomd(((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2), ((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))[^]2), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  sqcld((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  recnd((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  syl((hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H), (normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))‚àà ‚Ñù, (hs0[+h]hs1)‚àà ~H)
  hvaddcl(hs0, hs1)
  normcl((hs0[+h]hs1))
  sqcld((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H))
  syl((hs0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ~H), (normh `(hs0[-h]hs1))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs0[-h]hs1)‚àà ~H)
  hvsubcl(hs0, hs1)
  recnd((normh `(hs0[-h]hs1)), (hs0[-h]hs1)‚àà ~H)
  normcl((hs0[-h]hs1))
  syl2an(hs0 ‚àà ~H, hs1 ‚àà ~H, (2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2)))=((2[√ó]((normh ` hs0)[^]2))[+](2[√ó]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))), ((normh ` hs0)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((normh ` hs1)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sqcld((normh ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà ~H)
  recnd((normh ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà ~H)
  normcl(hs0)
  sqcld((normh ` hs1), hs1 ‚àà ~H)
  recnd((normh ` hs1), hs1 ‚àà ~H)
  normcl(hs1)
  mp3an1(((normh ` hs0)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((normh ` hs1)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2)))=((2[√ó]((normh ` hs0)[^]2))[+](2[√ó]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))), 2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  2cn()
  adddi(nat2, ((normh ` hs0)[^]2), ((normh ` hs1)[^]2))
  mp3an((c0 ‚àà CPreHilOLD ‚Üî(< < +h, .h >, normh > ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2))))))), +h ‚àà ùïå, .h ‚àà ùïå, normh ‚àà ùïå)
  elexi(cva, cablo)
  hvmulex()
  mp2an(normh ‚àà ùïå, (normh : ~H ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ~H ‚àà ùïå)
  normf()
  ax-hilex()
  fex(cno, chba, cr, universe)
  syl5bb((+h ‚àà ùïå ‚àß .h ‚àà ùïå ‚àß normh ‚àà ùïå), c0 ‚àà CPreHilOLD, (< < +h, .h >, normh > ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ~H, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ~H,(((normh `(hs0[+h]hs1))[^]2)[+]((normh `(hs0[+h](-u(1)[.h]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((normh ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((normh ` hs1)[^]2)))))), < < +h, .h >, normh > ‚àà CPreHilOLD)
  eleq1i(c0, ccphlo, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  isphg(hs0, hs1, cva, universe, csm, universe, cno, universe, chba)
  grporn(chba, cva)
  ax-mp(+h ‚àà GrpOp, +h ‚àà AbelOp)
  hilablo()
  ablogrpo(cva)
  fdmi(cva, (~H √ó ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  diff.hs1.c(chba)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cva)
  diff.hs0.c(csm)
  diff.hs0.c(cno)
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
  diff.hs1.c(cva)
  diff.hs1.c(csm)
  diff.hs1.c(cno)
}
